Description:
Convenient Location Close to Everything
This well maintain brick veneer villa unit is ideal for first home buyers and down sizers. It’s a must inspection if you’re looking for a low maintenance home or a great return on investment. Close proximity to all amenities and easy access to shops, bus, schools and major arterials.
Look no further than this lovely villa unit comprising;
- 2 good size bedrooms with built in robes
- renovated bathroom
- gas wall heater
- electric cook top
- low maintenance rear back yard
- lock up garage
Currently tenanted and returning $1217 per month but vacant possession is also available.
Walking distance to Pancake Parlour, local Hemmings Street shops, Dandenong and Yarraman train stations, Dandenong Hospital, Dandenong West primary school and easy access to all major arterials and public transport at your doorstep - enquire with confidence today.

Description:
Opportunity Not To Be Missed!
First home buyers or investors don't miss this little beauty. Sitting in a quiet pocket yet only minutes to local schools, shops & major arterials. Featuring open plan living/dining & modern kitchen with stone benchtops. 2 carpeted bedrooms with BIRs, downlights throughout & high ceilings. Modern bathroom & separate toilet. Huge private courtyard with access to single remote garage. Bonus of reverse cycle air conditioning. Potential rental return of $330 per week for investors or entry level into local market. Call now!
Navpreet Singh 0402 501 402
Gary Khatri 0450 009 002

Description:
Prestigious blue-chip location
This prime development site is set in one of Dandenongs blue-chip locations and only minutes walk to the plaza. This perfect rectangular site, measures approx 725m2 with high density zoning (Residential Growth) and has potential for multi-storey townhouses, units, apartments or 2 large homes(STP). Existing home is a modernized Californian bungalow style, boasting 3 bedrooms with BIR & polished floorboards throughout. Great size kitchen with gas cooking, dishwasher, meals area and a huge lounge/rumpus room. All this with split system and coonara. Can be let for around $1651 per calendar month. Amazing rare opportunity here.

Description:
UNDER CONTRACT..
Vendor Must Sell ($360,000 - $385,000)
On offer is this modern and stylish apartment situated in a prime location of Central Dandenong being only minutes away from Dandenong Plaza and all other major amenities.
Comprising of 3 bedrooms (master with walk in robe & full en-suite, second and third bedroom with walk in robe), shared balcony to master and second bedroom plus a separate balcony from living area.
There is a huge living/meals area, kitchen with stainless steel appliances, gas cooking and dishwasher. A second bathroom contains the laundry facilities. Split system, underground secure car park with two parking areas on title, With a storage box are more of the amazing features this home provides.
Currently returning $1605 PCM (with The potential for more)
Additional Features Include :
• Elevator with secure access
• Reverse Cycle 8kw Daikan Airconditioner
This Property is a must inspect, contact Dandenongs number one real estate team for further information

Description:
Great Buying Here
This well presented home would be perfect for those seeking to downsize or entering the market. It features the following
. Reverse cycle air conditioning, solar panels and remote controlled garage.
. Large rear courtyard which wraps around the property, with an undercover pergola.
. Updated kitchen with breakfast bar area and plenty of storage
. Large front bedroom with built in robes. Built in robes in the second bedroom.
. Separate laundry with additional storage.
.The complex is quiet and superbly located, with good neighbours.. There is a common area outside for parking.
A separate toilet and updated bathroom complete the package. Recent sales in the complex make this an excellent buy for those wishing to add to their portfolio or enter the current competitive market.

Description:
Central and So Convenient!
This recently renovated unit is in a quiet location but so so central to everything. It features:
. New double glazed windows to all openings including fly screens
. New electric cooker
.New 5.5 KW reverse cycle air conditioning, heating and cooling
. Complex has been fully refurbished including new gutters and eaves.
The property is currently rented on a month to month basis, and the tenant would love to stay.
Additionally the property has been repainted, new switches installed, window trims replaced, and new window furnishings installed including a roller blind to the lounge.
There is a car space on title to the rear of the building. Location is second to none: walking distance to Dandenong station, Dandenong central shopping, and bus routes at the front of the building.
Perfect for downsizers or investors, the unit won't last long!

Great Investment or First Home!
This 1 bedroom ground floor apartment is an ideal investment or first home. Facing towards the Hemmings Park and offering beautiful views and privacy the apartment features a central bathroom with laundry, separate toilet, open plan living, meals and kitchen area, single car space and convenient living with great access to Dandenong High School, public transport including trains and buses, Dandenong Plaza and Market. Being currently leased for $210 per week with impressive tenants this property should without doubt appeal to all investors. Make a time to view the property today!

Description:
Fantastic First home or Investment with Development Potential
Secure your future today! Either move straight in or rent straight out, this renovated 2 bedroom home on 625m2 approx block is perfect for development either now or in the future. Retain the existing property and build at the rear, develop the whole site STCA, or just sit back and enjoy the capital growth while enjoying this wonderful home. Featuring a spacious lounge, 2 good sized bedrooms, convenience of 2 toilets, gas heating and A/C, while the sparkling kitchen & bathroom have both been freshly updated.
Comes with the added bonus of a 2 room rear studio / bungalow with bathroom & toilet , that would be the perfect teenagers retreat or man cave, generous grassed backyard, secure front fencing and plenty of concreted driveway to park many cars. Good location, with schools, bus, shops, Train station, Eastlink and Monash freeways all close by.
Call for an inspection today!

Description:
Only 2 on the block!
With only 2 properties on the block say good bye to body corporate fees & hello to a property built to perfection!
This magnificent Townhouse set on good block of land 311 m2 Approx. It has an amazing open plan design as natural light fills the living rooms & the kitchen with large open plan.
This beautiful townhouse comprises of 2 spacious bedrooms plus a huge study which can be converted to a 3rd bedrooms, the ground floor has a shower and a toilet. Ideal for split living. Massive kitchen stainless steel appliances & plenty of storage space, high ceiling quality tile work. Large Living space with reverse cycle split A/C. central ducted heating it will keep your family warm in winter. Walk upstairs to the master with full ensuite and a toilets. Second bedroom with BIR and a separate toilet.
Step outside to a beautiful outdoor entertaining area complete with brick, huge water tank, garden shed & large single lock up garage with remote control and your own private drive way allowing you more parking space.
This unique new modern high class townhouse has plenty to offer in a very good location, centrally located and close to all amenities. Just a minute's walk to Dandenong Plaza shopping complex, Dandenong market and Dandenong Hospital. Convenient public transport and close to Dandenong primary/ high schools makes this property more desirable.
For the inspection, please contact Huy Tran on 0423086218.

Description:
A low maintenance single storey home in 'Metro Village'
In the brilliantly designed Metro Village community where low maintenance housing meets practicality and a great location, this single storey home will please occupiers and investors like. With Dandenong Creek and walking tracks at one end of the street, buses at the other and Dandenong train station nearby, the home is ideally positioned to give you easy access central Dandenong's shops, eateries and activities. The home features a generous tiled lounge/dining room that incorporates the huge kitchen with walk in pantry and stainless steel appliances. There are 3 robed bedrooms including the master with walk in wardrobe and a full ensuite to complement the family bathroom and second toilet. With ducted heating and split system air conditioners in the main bedroom and living area your comfort is assured. Outside you find a single remote garage with internal access as well as a compact and easily maintained backyard.

Description:
PRIME LOCATION TOP CLASS TOWNHOUSE!
This double story dwelling is a must see property. Features separate living and dining area, 3 large bedrooms with built in robes, master bedroom with ensuite, Common bathroom toilet and a powder room. Also it has inclusions such as ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ducted vaccum system, intercom system and security alarm. Dining family area opens up to a covered pergola area with a low maintenance landscaped gardens and a steel shed. All above complimented with an internal access to the garage with a remote and open tandem parking space for additional car parking.
Location is key within all the amenities on your fingertips such as next door grocery shop, take away shops, medical centers, schools, bus stop, plaza complex, market and hospital. Perfect as an entry level first home or as an investment property with a potential rent of $360 per week. No active owner's corporation is certainly going to attract your attention without the worry of ever increasing outgoing fees.
Priced to sell so be hurry before its gone.

Description:
Ready, Set, Build!
If you have been looking to sink your teeth into a new development then this one may be for you. Sitting on a lot of 647 sqm this property is being sold with an existing planning permit for the development of 2 double storey townhouses. The double storey townhouses to be constructed will both be 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms and double lock up garage with total sizes of 21.44 squares (unit 1) and 20.41 squares (unit 2). With an existing concrete dwelling that features 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, formal lounge area and separate kitchen meals area as well as having a secure tenant in place this property is ideal for small developers/builders or potentially 2 friends to partner up and build their own homes to live in. Do not wait until it is too late! Arrange to view the plans and property today!

Description:
Stylish townhouse in a supreme location!
Don't miss this opportunity to get your hands on this front townhouse complete with its own front yard! Downstairs comprises of an open plan lounge, kitchen with stainless steel appliances, adjoining meals area which overlooks a private courtyard which and is the perfect outdoor entertaining space to host those weekend barbeques. There is also a separate powder room.
Walk upstairs to find three spacious bedrooms and an open study space. Master bedroom is completed with ensuite and walk in robe. The remaining bedrooms both feature built in robes and share a central bathroom. Extras include a double garage, ducted heating, evaporative cooling and water tank.
Situated in an excellent location, walking distance to Dandenong Station as well as other useful amenities; an array of shops, bus stops, cafes and many primary & secondary schools.

Description:
Home is where the Heart is!!
Whether you're looking to downsize, get into the market or buy an investment property, this property ticks all the boxes. Walk inside into your generous living area with split system a/c. Walk through to a kitchen with gas cooking, meals area and double sink with a window that looks out to your lush courtyard. Take comfort in your oversized master bedroom with walk in robe and second bedroom with BIR and carpet throughout. Bathroom features both a shower and a bath with separate toilet. Generous size laundry with a back door leading to your very own under cover entertaining area with a kitchenette to cook outdoors and a sink. Secured single garage with remote access with plenty of room in front for a second car if need be. 2 security cameras with 24 hrs surveillance and a monitor. 2500 litre rainwater tank. Only minutes from everything Dandenong has to offer including Dandenong plaza, Dandenong market, Dandenong hospital, primary and secondary schools and plentiful public transport waiting to take you anywhere you desire. If you've been waiting for a property that is perfectly located and priced to sell then this is it.

Description:
Potential Plus In Fantastic Dandenong Location!
Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity to purchase this renovated and spacious home with a large and secure backyard!
Greeted by a porch upon entrance, this semi-detached brick veneer home is set in an ideal location with convenience at your fingertips. Boasting three spacious bedrooms, this beautiful home features a renovated bathroom with a large shower. At the front of the home, the sizeable lounge room is warm and welcoming making you feel right at home, with polished hardwood flooring and gas ducted heating throughout. This unique home has traditional character features which include: high ceilings, solid timber skirtings and timber window frames, decorative cornices and picture rails. The kitchen has been updated and offers an upright cooker. There is also potential to extend the home into the deep, secure backyard. Added bonuses outside include: two colour bond sheds and fruit trees.
Key features include: possibility to extend house into the backyard, Dandenong's strong future growth and increasing demand in the area, Capital Growth, Fully updated / renovated home, Large backyard, New Hot water Service, Ducted Heating. Other great features include: off street parking and no body corporate fees.
In an exceptionally convenient location, close to schools, EastLink, bike tracks, Dandenong Plaza, good schools and train stations this is an opportunity not to be missed. Give Zed a call now to avoid disappointment!
Insights: 2/83 Jones Road, Dandenong VIC 3175 was last sold in 2017 and 123 other 3 bedroom house in Dandenong have recently been sold.
